name: Challenge #8: Passengers... passengers everywhere!
description: In this challenge Passengers will keep coming randomly between each City. You have two Vehicles to help you deliver them. Your objective is to deliver 20 Passengers under 60 seconds.
helpText: Use both of your <c>Vehicle</c>s for optimal delivery;
Remember that the <c>Vehicle</c> has three events: <e c="Vehicle">visitCity</e>, <e c="Vehicle">idle</e> and <e c="Vehicle">loadPassenger</e>
<c>City</c> class also has its own event when a <c>Passenger</c> appears: <e c="City">newPassenger</e>;

victory.text: Deliver 20 passengers to their desired destination.
victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.passengersDelivered >= 20 }

defeat.text: Timer must not go over 30 seconds
defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.elapsedTimeSeconds > 60; }
